title: When you lag right in the middle of a 1v1 dual. . . .
body:
And when the lag goes away you find that somehow you won. . . .
http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2015-03/28/18/enhanced/webdr14/anigif_enhanced-21996-1427582134-11.gif

replies.body: The annoying part is where you get into a 1v1 duel, start lagging, lose, and then the person you were fighting taunts you. They think they outplayed you when in reality you couldn't do much because of lag, but if you say that then you just look like a salty loser.
I'll just mute and report them
Taunt is banable , there are a lot of people out there got banned for saying ggez
Ofcourse its bannable,the taunt command is just a bait for an ez ban
So much this

I once got killed by an afk Fiora (Pre-rework)

She was really fed and than went afk for about 2 minutes near her inhib, She had auto-attack on and I started attacking her and she critted me like 3 times and then I was ded.
Don't forget the famous disconnected Vayne penta a good long time ago.

one cool too was boxbox without keyboard on stream he got a quadra with riven

 ~~but riven has no 2nd bar so i can do this too jk~~
That's got my story beat. My best was a Xin double + inhibitor kill while my mouse wasn't working. All i could do was Q and W and hope my auto attacks hit the right target.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8TL_pI3SnrY
Hyper typing leads to spelling errors. Too late to change the title now.
I always lag, but I've been getting the worse kind of lag lately where the gameplay still continues as normal yet for some damn reason you can't control yourself... So irritating :l

Reminds me of this cross over comic:
http://img02.deviantart.net/424b/i/2013/300/1/3/rvb_rwby__friendly_competition_by_sketchingchaos-d6s398t.jpg
That moment when you lag out and think that your going to lose but then you realise that your Rammus and that it'll be ok.
Happens to me a LOT
It's happened to me about three times I think.
There There, I still like you Embertine =3
Duel*{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Happens so much -_- cept I lose.
I just am like: I CAN DO SO MUCH BETTER PLS LET ME TRY AGAIN PLS 
But tbh it's pretty funny/heartbreaking when you start walking through walls or your spells cast 5 seconds after you click them.

"No, you hit W and stood still"
{{champion:9}} "ah, ok"

(playing {{champion:45}} )

Team: No. You just hit R.
Nerf {{champion:74}}

i have killed some people while i had the Attempting to reconnect text in my screen

What have i done? Can i replay that?
It is called you have the "Auto-attack" check box clicked in settings and you ult as vayne. Guaranteed penta if your team can peal and the enemy wants your ass. :D
I once tabbed out in the middle of a fight.
My old computer kept coming close to overheating but I could still play league but this pop-up would come up a lot. You probably know how that ends.
This happened to me yesterday during I lagged panicked and somehow got 2 kills and walked with like 30HP.

I dont typically lag, but GOD DAMN This unstable patch loves to Stutter in fights XD.

Or the serves really, really suck, and i somehow get a "reconnecting" message in-game, then "reconnect" and i note i get NO kills, but im the only one in the game that is connected XD. Everyone else was AFK while trying to reconnect. It was funny. Cracked me up, since this is NOT the first time it has happened and with 5.22 happens a bit more often than it use to. Was laughing pretty hard i didn't even push waves, was too busy contacting my cousin through phone to see if he will be able to reconnect as well, while laughing. Damn near brought a tear to my eye at how funny it was. Free farmed a bit, free dragon, got killed by Baron. And then people start reconnecting once i respawn.

Anoying when it stutters, but great when everyone dc's from a Riot Server issue  XD.

I even noted that certain ppl with crappy connections make me lag if i get close to them, and if they dc, i stop lagging XD. Riot pls. Dont punish me for having better internet and hardware ^_^.
I was threw a successful lantern in the midst of lag. Only good one that match.

When you disconnect in the middle of a fight and reconnect to find that you've gotten a kill.

Mathematical.
When you spell duel as dual. :^)
Would correct spelling kill anyone?
